confirmation_check_1: I am the rightful owner of this service
confirmation_check_2: I can deliver all work as described
confirmation_check_3: I have read and agree to the Fastwork Terms of Service
confirmation_error: Please accept terms and conditions to proceed
confirmation_notice_1: The system will begin checking job information after the freelancer profile is approved
confirmation_notice_2: Service review and approval may take around 2 business days
confirmation_warning: If you do not confirm the terms, you will not be able to publish services on Fastwork.
cover_image_note: Select a cover image that clearly represents your field and expertise. A good cover image helps attract potential clients.
cover_image_note_2: Make sure to use different cover images for similar services in the same category. Repeated use of images may result in rejection.
create_package_description: Service packages help make your project easier to manage, reducing the need for detailed discussions with the client. You can create at least one and up to three packages per service.
define_work_steps_description: Describe the steps you will take to complete the service. This helps clients understand your workflow.
service_description_error: Description must be at least 10 characters
service_title_error: Title must be at least 5 characters
service_title_guide_1: Use a clear and specific title so clients can easily find your service.
service_title_guide_2: Ensure different titles for similar services within the same category.
service_title_placeholder: E.g.: Professional website design, SEO optimized
submission_success: Your information is being processed and may take up to 2 working days.
submission_success_message: Submission successful! Please wait for system approval.
upload_at_least_2_images_note: Clients want to know about your skills. Choose at least 2 images that showcase your skills and expertise.
upload_gallery_error: At least 2 service images are required
